locations.name: The Abandoned Well
locations.description: A crumbling stone well sits at the edge of a clearing. The air is cold, and something glints below.
locations.gm_guide: The well is the entrance to the underground passage. The rope can be used, but it's unreliable.

locations.name: The Bottom of the Well
locations.description: Damp, mossy stone walls rise around you. Water drips from above. A heavy, rusted chest sits in the corner.

npcs.name: Cowering Goblin
npcs.description: A small, trembling goblin clutching a bent dagger.

locations.gm_guide: The chest contains the forest map. The goblin knows about the secret switch but only reveals it if befriended.

locations.name: The Dark Tunnel
locations.description: A narrow, winding tunnel leads deeper underground. Strange mushrooms glow faintly along the walls.
locations.gm_guide: The tunnel is safe but disorienting. The mushrooms are edible and restore 1 HP.

journeys.description: A precarious climb down the rusted ladder.

A low passage behind the chest leads into a dark tunnel.
